page.title: 14 GOLD PROSPECTING
page.content: Gold prospecting has recently begun in this area and the results look promising. Eight men are based Gortin.They go out on the mountain and take soil samples.Then they take cobria samples.They also pan for gold in rivers and streams.If they find gold in the rocks or in the water they bring out a dimond drill and drill a deep test hole in the rock.They bring the rock down to Gortin.The rock is crushed up in a crusher.Then it is sampled.Anything intresting is sent to Limerick to see how much gold is in it. They have two "moon buggies".They take them out to get up the hills.The first person to find out about the gold was a man called Garthe.He found out about it when he was taking samples.
